ing: 1 (3.4 ounce) package butterscotch instant pudding mix
1 (15.25 ounce) can crushed pineapple, in juice
1 (16 ounce) package frozen non-dairy whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is a wonderful yet simple sweet fruit salad.  Anyone can make this, and it is sooooo yummy!  People always ask for this recipe."
ins: Toss the diced apples with the packet of pudding mix and peanuts until well combined. Stir in the pineapple and whipped topping. Cover and refrigerate overnight.
